ygData.subject: Equipment Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess i will add my stuff to the list....but not impressive compared with most everyone else.. Bronze Hat Snakeskin Mask Opoline Earring X2 Lambent Bracers
ygData.messageBody:
I guess i will add my stuff to the list....but not impressive compared with
most everyone else..

Bronze Hat
Snakeskin Mask
Opoline Earring X2
Lambent Bracers X2
Lambent Sleeves (or whatever)
Cape o' midnight mist
Crested Spaulders
Jagged Band
Plat Amber ring
Snakeskin Gloves (have the components, no PP for the gems for lambent :-( )
Charred Guardian Breastplate
Thick Leather Apron
Bronze Legs (same problem as gloves, have pieces, no money)
Bronze boots
Polar bear cloak (not the cloak of the ice bear, the one you buy from him)

Weapons:
Dragoon Dirk
Combine Scimitar
Water Crystal Staff
(what i use where is not important, as long as i keep all 4 melee skills maxed
out)

Instruments:
All store bought

Misc:
Crude Stein (for use after carrillion)
Squad ring (err...Marshall Ghobber and i are buds)

Money .... heh...yeah....right. I'm not broke, because it is possible to make
a (very tiny) profit baking (when your skill is really high)....but that is the
only reason.

Kaleid
23rd song (partially retired)
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus


=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
